SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

org.jvnet.hk2.annotations
Annotation Type Service

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface Service

Marker interface for service implementation. A service is defined by an interface marked with the Contract annotation. Each service implementation must be marked with the @Service interface and implement the service interface.

Author:
Jerome Dochez, Kohsuke Kawaguchi

Optional Element Summary
 java.lang.Class<? extends Factory> factory
          If this implementation is created from a factory (instead of calling the default constructor), then specify the factory class.
 java.lang.String name
          Returns name of the service
 java.lang.Class<? extends Scope> scope
          Indicates the scope that this implementation is tied to.
 

name

public abstract java.lang.String name
Returns name of the service

Returns:
name of the service
Default:
""

scope

public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends Scope> scope
Indicates the scope that this implementation is tied to.

Default:
org.jvnet.hk2.component.PerLookup.class

factory

public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends Factory> factory
If this implementation is created from a factory (instead of calling the default constructor), then specify the factory class.

If specified, the factory component is activated, and Factory.getObject() is used to obtain the instance, instead of the default action, which is to call the constructor.

The resource injection and extraction happens like it normally does, after the factory returns the object.

Default:
org.jvnet.hk2.component.Factory.class
